page.title: 06TRACTOR SALES IN PONTESFORD
page.content: Rea Valley Tractors is situated in Pontesford and has been trading since 1908, selling petrol, oil and motor vehicles.In l978 they started selling tractors under the name of Alexander and Duncan, changing their name to Rea Valley Tractors in 1984. They sell tractors, combine harvesters, general farm machinery and supplies, there is also a large service area for cars and tractors. They supply a big area, including Staffordshire, Herefordshire,Mid-Wales and Cheshire. Their busy days are Friday and Saturday. It is a profitable business run by a local family. They supply John Deere farm machinery and also have a forecourt selling Oakley Petroleum products, sweets and tobaccos.
